ygData.subject: RE: Wakishi quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, i had a dark elf necro in south karana come talk to grimlot.  i was KOS, he was amiable.  the site that had the wakizishi linked to grimlot said it was
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jesse [mailto:j@...]
> Sent: Saturday, July 24, 1999 10:27 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Wakishi quest
>
>
> From: Jesse <j@...>
>
>
> > Yes Lord Grimlot gives you nothing back for the Lute, he
> equips it when you
> > give it to him. That is not the Wakizashi quest.
>
> You were playing your dark elf SK when you tested, right?
>

No, i had a dark elf necro in south karana come talk to grimlot. i was KOS,
he was amiable. the site that had the wakizishi linked to grimlot said it
was for SK or Necro. I am not sure, but wouldn't grimlot just not talk at
all to you about the quest if you weren't the right race/class? do you
think he would talk about his lost love's bones to a dark elf necro, but
talk about the lute to a dark elf SK? i doubt it, and being told by many
how to really get the wakizishi,having nothing to do with grimlot, i figure
grimlot is not part of it.

Shada
